Spec.title: OLD Uber-Tank 4Aura Kalandra instead of Recomb Ring

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
A build made by Tarekis.
^x3F6DB3^xFFFF77^xC8C8C8^7Check out my YouTube and Twitch for more content like the Video Build or Crafting Guide:^7^7 ^xE05030^xD02090^xB97123^xE05030https://www.youtube.com/@Tarekis-official^7^7^7^7 ^xE05030^xD02090^xADAA47^x7070FFhttps://www.twitch.tv/tarekis^7^7^7^7
^xFFFF77A note about PoB config:^7 ^7^7 The PoB is configured with cooldown skills enabled, but Guard skills disabled, to reflect Boss damage with cooldowns up. Trash mob damage is irrelevant, as Tribal Fury + additional Strike targets up to triples your regular damage.
^xAF6025LEVELING^7
^xD02090^7See this Leveling Guide for an example on how to level this build: ^xFFFF77https://pobb.in/u/tarekis%235639/tarekis-shadow-leveling^7^7
^xAF6025GEAR PROGRESSION^7 A rough outline of what investment levels should you get which upgrades at. These sections and prices depend on the current market, which I cannot account for in here, and at the time you check out the progression the prices for some equipment might be very different.
^x8888FFClose to none Investment^7 To start out, all you need is Ephemeral Edge, uncorrupted. Grab as much ES on your gear as possible and cap your resistances. Fix your accuracy with tree, gear and cheap benchcrafts.
^x8888FF10-20d Investment^7 Grab the most important/cheap uniques: - Resolute Technique EE - Aegis Aurora - Darkness Enthroned with budget increased % mod + Abyss Jewels - Cheap Lethal Pride - Vessel of Vintkar - Stormshroud + shock avoid on abyss jewels Depending on prices, get a Voice of the Storm
Get your Enlighten 3 and start running all auras. Swap out Purity once you get Stormshroud.
Upgrade ES as much as possible on your rares, keep your res capped! Do not forget to use lesser eldrich implicits, they are cheap and impactful.
^x8888FF50d^7 Grab all Uniques besides (maybe) Bottled Faith or Light of Meaning if it's extremely expensive, max out DE, 100% is probably not worth it yet, get the best bargain at ~90-95+ belts Annointed Voice of the Storm Upgrade your Lethal Pride, if you get a (near) perfect one now, you can forget about it later, your res or strength requirements may change depending on your LP, so lock in your final one as soon as your budget allows Watcher's Eye, possibly with 2 wrath mods, depending on prices
Upgrade ES as much as possible on your rares, keep your res capped!
^x8888FF100d^7 Grab every Unique in Mid-Tier, and as always, push ES as high as you can on your gear
Moving shock avoid to 100% DE + perfect 50% shock avoid jewel to get or at least prepare for +4 Aura Helmet is advisable. You can juggle around with boot implicits to account for something like a 98% + 49% combo instead. Upgrade your eldrich implicits from lessers.
^x8888FFBeyond^7 +4 Aura Helmet Upgrade your eldrich implicits with Conflicts, only do this for already finished slots like +4 frenzy, +frenzy, 6T1 items, etc. This shouldn't be done on items you plan to replace at any reasonable point Possibly Res fixing, so you can do conducitivy ring, whispers of doom/tribal fury annoint juggling, etc shenangians, or MB full tank focus (only go MB if you prefer EHP over DPS, stay with DE for DPS) Mirror Chest (you could mirror other slots but the gain from any non-chest slot is rather small).
Anything more is mostly limit pushing and you can check Uber-Tanks for even more absurdly tanky setups or swap to a crit variant if you want more DPS if you have a few mirrors to drop.
^xAF6025CRAFTING/BUYING GUIDES^7
^xE05030^xC8C8C8^7!!^7 ^xE05030READ THIS FIRST^7^7^7 !!^7
Self-crafting essentially all ^xFFFF77rares^7^7, you can try to buy them but they'll probably be at a hefty premium if you find any that match.^7 I craft those items for profit myself, and that profit is what you will pay a crafter for if you do not want to do it yourself.
If you have the currency to do so Sacred Orb your bases.
^xFFFF77Fractured bases are expensive^xC8C8C8^7. Usually it's more economically viable to craft on lightly overqualified bases (usually 24-26%) with dense fossil spam for prefixes instead. If you want giga gear you will want to self-fracture. These cost x4 the cost of a fracturing orb + your base, so only do this if you are looking for some expensive upgrades, and should only be done on 29%+ quality bases.
^xFFFF77Color offsocket 4-links with jewellers, not chroms.^7 This works with bench crafting 2 sockets, forcing base colors, e.g. 2R, then spamming 3-2-3-2 sockets until your third socket hits the correct color, then the same with 4-3 sockets.
The ^xE050303R^7^x70FF702G^7^x7070FF1B^7 Chest is best done with 1R bench craft on average.
^xE05030Video Crafting Guide:^7 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pxiTs8ic2ZA
^x8888FFTrade Site Searches:^7 I have made some predefined searches that'll allow you to quickly find decent items.
Lethal Prides:
Budget Version (Intimidation, 1 Rage on hit, these searches includes the Clever Thief node!!!!) https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Mercenaries/j0JmM7bTX https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Mercenaries/j0JmlLrfX https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Mercenaries/EXdgzqLt5
Strong Version: At least 5% Double Damage, + Intimiation, 1 Rage on hit: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Settlers/DM8dqZBi5
Cluster Jewel: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Mercenaries/zYj9ybmh4 Abyss Jewel: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Mercenaries/olBqzrZhl (^xFFFF77You can lower the weighted sum to something more affordable^7)
You can also craft Abysses yourself, but it's extremely annyoing, and you're semi lucky to get 3 mods right, 4 is very unrealistic. You grab a fractured murderous eye jewel (ES or 50% shock avoid fracture), and spam metallic fossils until it's good enough.
^xFFFF77Helmet:^7^7 ^x8888FFCrafting:^7 ^xFFFF77Fractured bases are expensive^xC8C8C8^7. See above for generic crafting steps.
You can sacrifice a jewel slot for another shock avoid jewel to make the helmet cheaper!
Prefixes: you want as high ES as possible, if you want to increase DPS veiled chaos prefixes for +2 AoE Suffixes: Shock Avoid, Ele Res / Int, (+2 Essence Mod if you can min-max shock avoid with boot mods or 50% jewel + 100% DE)
My crafting process: - Fractured ES Mod Lich's Circlet (flat fracture is better than %inc, since benchcraft %inc is way better) - Spam T1 Torments or Delirium (if you moved shock avoid to abyss jewels) until 2 high tier res/int, you can exalt/eldrich exalt the last suffix - Add Searching Dominance
Prefix strategies: Efficent: - Eldrich Chaos for secondary ES mod - Eldrich Exalted if Chaos was empty (if cheaper than raw Exalted) - Benchcraft last ES or +1 to AoE mod
Costly +2/4 AoE: - Clear Prefixes (high chance with Eldrich Chaos) - Lock Suffixes - Veiled chaos - Craft + zombie if empty to block some unveils - Unveil +2 AoE - Benchcraft last ES mod - If prexises were filled, repeat the entire craft
Insanity: - Clear Prefixes (high chance with Eldrich Chaos) - Block mana, roll T1 ES - Lock Suffixes - Veiled chaos, hope for hit lock suffix - Unveil +2 AoE - If you don't hit the veiled chaos or the unveil, repeat
^x3F6DB3^xFFFF77Gloves:^7^xFFFF77 ^x8888FFCrafting:^7^7 ^xFFFF77Fractured bases are expensive^xC8C8C8^7. See above for generic crafting steps.
This league I'm going with abyss socket jewels because we're on such low gem pressure. This is a expensive craft, but here's how: - Fractured Flat ES Base - 3-socket Resonator with Hollow & Shuddering & Sanctified Spam until you get good attack speed suffix - If open suffix, slam and pray, if it hits int or res, continue, else back to resonators - Exarch Dominance - Eldrich Chaos orb if too many prefixes - Eldrich Exalt/Annul until %inc ES - Craft damage while leeching or damage with non-vaal
^7Default process: - Fractured ES Mod Warlock Gloves (flat for atk spd, hybrid %inc for pure ES) - Spam T1 Zeal until 2 high tier res/int (use Woe for pure ES until triple T1 ES alternatively) - Fish for non-vaal veiled chaos if you want to burn some currency, and you intend to use vaal haste/vaal totem regularly.
If you went for atk spd, you need to fix prefixes: - Eldrich Chaos for secondary ES mod or +lightning to attacks - Eldrich Exalted if Chaos was empty - Benchcraft last ES mod
If you went for pure ES you need to fix suffixes, which is a bit lackluster IMO You could also throw in a prefix lock and veiled chaos + slam if you want but probably do: - Eldrich Chaos until 1/2 high tier res/int - Eldrich Exalted if Chaos only had 1 mod - Benchcraft last mod^7
^xFFFF77Boots:^7 ^x8888FFCrafting:^7^7 ^xFFFF77Fractured bases are expensive^xC8C8C8^7. See above for generic crafting steps.
This league I'm going with abyss socket jewels because we're on such low gem pressure. This is an expensive craft, but here's how: - High Quality ES Base - 3-socket Resonator with Hollow & Fundamental & Sanctified Spam until you get good int suffix - If you have an open suffix you can keep it open for bleed immunity. - Exarch Dominance - Eldrich Chaos orb and exalt until good enough (since we have 3 open prefixes and high quality T3 and T2s aren't all that bad to settle for, keep rolling according to your budget)
^7My crafting process: - Fractured %inc ES Mod Warlock Boots if you do essence spam - Spam T1 Woe until high hybrid ES - Fix Suffixes with Eldrich Currency as above
If you are running Vaal Flicker Strike, you can Veiled Chaos for inc dmg during Soul Gain Prevention for a good DPS increase while it's on CD, this is only really useful for very beefy bosses tho
^xFFFF77Body Armour:^7 You can just roll a Bronn's Lithe (definitely cheaper) or craft a rare chest with high ES/Evasion with resistances/attributes:
^x8888FFCrafting:^7 ^xFFFF77Fractured bases are expensive^xC8C8C8^7. See above for generic crafting steps.
- Fractured T2 %es/eva Necrotic Armour - Spam Dense/Prismatic until double T1 ES/Evasion - Eldrich Suffix fix if you didn't get lucky with resistances/attributes - Veiled Chaos for hybrid Attributes is decent, but not worth IMO
^xFFFF77Rare ^7^xFFFF77Ring:^7 Finish off your build with whatever you need from ring, and get ES & Damage if you're res capped. You can build your ring spamming Torment or Woe and hoping for the best, or just buy one. I simply searched for ES, flat lighting, ele w/ atk, ele/lightning %dmg and bought the best price/value one.
^xFFFF77Rare Abyss Jewels:^7 If you run Darkness Enthroned socket the best ones there, preferrably: ES & Flat Lightning & Flat Lightning w/ Swords & Atk Speed Fix your Shock avoidance with one, and get Corrupted Blood Immunity if you don't have another jewel that does
^xAF6025Belt:^7 High-rolled ^xAF6025Darkness Enthroned^7 with DPS ^xFFFF77Abyss Jeweles^7 or ^xFFFF77Crystal Belt^7 (unlikely to be better) with ES, Flask Effect, Ele Dmg (Res if you need it)
^xAF6025Tincture:^7 ^xAF6025^x8888FFMagic Pen Tincture^7^7 for strict boss cooldown. ^xAF6025Sap of the Seasons^7^7 for super cheap constant uptime and ramping up penetration for bosses with higher ceiling (instant leech allows up to 40-50 penetration), ^x8888FF ^7What feels better for you very likely depens on what type of content you are running. I'm leaving Sap as default for now, not sure what others are playing.^7
^xAF6025Lethal Pride:^7^7^7 Essentially just get the Indimidation Chance Node, Rage on Hit if you can, then as many Double Damage Chance as possible, and maybe Strength to complete requirements. There are other cool mods like fire res, phys as fire, so you can round off your build that way too. To tweak/inspect combos: Conqueror does not matter as Keystone wont be specced, deselect all and select only used nodes! https://vilsol.github.io/timeless-jewels/tree?jewel=2&conqueror=Kaom&seed=15436&location=61834&mode=stats&stat=5806&stat=8164
